content.heading: Check if you can get a divorce in England and Wales
content.connection: You must have some connection to England or Wales for the court to have the jurisdiction (the legal power) to grant you a divorce.
content.task: Answer the following questions to find out your connections.
content.petitioner: Is your life mainly based in England or Wales?
content.info: This may include working, owning property, having children in school, and your main family life taking place in England or Wales.
content.respondent: Is your {{ divorceWho }}'s life mainly based in England or Wales?

jurisdictionPetitionerResidence.required: Select yes if your life is mainly based in England or Wales

jurisdictionRespondentResidence.required: Select yes if your {{ divorceWho }}'s life is mainly based in England or Wales
